text: Nikolay Kolev (, born 8 February 1973) is a Bulgarian rower. He competed in the men's coxless pair event at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Bulgaria Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Plovdiv
title: Nikolay Kolev (rower, born 1973)
